paper_title: Uncertainty-aware phase prediction of RMPEAs via mixture density networks

claims.claim: Even after seven active-learning cycles, the MDN model trained using the low-uncertainty selection strategy achieves an F1 score on the remaining Ti-alloys that remains below 0.45
instruction: The code loads the MDN model obtained after seven active-learning cycles, evaluates it on the remaining Ti-alloy samples, and computes the F1 score.
Confirm that the reported F1 score is below 0.45
